title: Hulu video after update to Version 84?
content: I have a number of computer but two of them are my main used units. The first computer update Firefox to V 84 and I did not make the connection but after it updating it would not play Hulu video. I made the connection when the second computer update because I had to restart Firefox to finish the update. Then when to play a Hulu show and it would not work. It gives a Hulu Error code: P-DEV327 but itâ€™s really funny because it was playing Hulu videos 10 minutes before that? I have google a number of times when trying to fix the first computer but no luck. Any thoughts Thanks
creator: thauff

title: Social media stoped from following me, GOOD.
content: Firefox warned me that they had stopped a social media site from following me. GOOD but worrying, the warning came just after I failed to get into my bank account for the first time in four years. Which social media site was this? I do not use ANY?
creator: knotbovered

title: Trying to open Firefox browser.
content: A couple of updates ago Firefox started acting funky. When I right clicked on the icon in the taskbar Firefox would flash the start page for about 2 seconds then go back to the screen saver. I found that if I right clicked and then selected open new tab the program would open and I could select bookmarks and go to that selection, then I had to right click on the HOME icon to get to the home page. I have a work around, but it's not working like it used to. I have uninstalled firefox and reinstalled it with the same results. Any ideas? Thank you in advance.
creator: daotm98

title: Cannot log into my bank's website
content: I cannot log into my bank/CU website. I have been informed that other Firefox users are having this same problem. What are you going to do about this?
creator: normswinter
